post.title: What three items should every man own?

author.bio: Unironic Anarcho-Monarchist. I also collect stamps.

body:
A man should at all times carry on his person a (1) pocket knife,  (2) a comb, and (3) $5 in singles. 

In his house, he should have (1) a proper toolbox, (2) a wet shaving set, and (3) some Cassical literature in physical form in his bookshelf (e.g. the Bible, Homer, Vergil, Shakespeare).
body_html:
A man should at all times carry on his person a (1) pocket knife, (2) a comb, and (3) $5 in singles.

In his house, he should have (1) a proper toolbox, (2) a wet shaving set, and (3) some Cassical literature in physical form in his bookshelf (e.g. the Bible, Homer, Vergil, Shakespeare).

And why do we need a bookshelf of classical literature?
